actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To include geriatrics and gerontology in the definition of "primary health services" under the National Health Service Corps program.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Caring for an Aging America Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to include geriatrics and gerontology within the definition of "primary health services" for purposes of the National Health Service Corps.

titles.title: To include geriatrics and gerontology in the definition of "primary health services" under the National Health Service Corps program.
